info.title: WaAPI API
info.description: WaAPI is a simple API gateway for sending WhatsApp messages. On top of that, you are able to fully control your virtual WhatsApp application just by sending simple REST API requests.

tags.name: instances
tags.description: Operations related to managing WhatsApp instances.

tags.name: client
tags.description: Operations related to the WhatsApp client within an instance.

tags.name: message
tags.description: Operations related to sending and managing messages.

get.description: Retrieve a list of your instances.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter instances by ID or name

post.description: Create a new instance

get.description: Retrieve a single instance by its ID

requestBody.description: To reset the value, apply `null` for `url` or `[]` for `events`

get.description: retrieve the status of your running client

Retrieves a base64 encoded QR code image that can be used to authenticate and connect a WhatsApp account to this instance. The QR code should be scanned using the WhatsApp mobile app to complete authentication.

qrCode.description: Base64 encoded QR code image and associated metadata

self.description: URL of this QR code endpoint

status.description: Status of the QR code request

get.description: retrieve general information of the whatsapp user conntected to your instance

post.summary: Send a text message to a chat
post.description:
Send a text message to a chat. The chatId format varies depending on the chat type:
- Individual chat: {phone_number}@c.us (e.g. 491234567890@c.us)
- Group chat: {group_id}@g.us (e.g. 123456789-123456789@g.us)
- Channel/Newsletter: {channel_id}@newsletter (e.g. 123456789@newsletter)

message.description: Text message to send. Can include @123456789 for group chats.

mentions.description: Optional array of contact IDs to mention. Only works in group chats. Make sure to include @123456789 in the message text.

replyToMessageId.description: Optional message ID to reply to. Format: {fromMe}_{chatId}_{messageId}

previewLink.description: Whether to show link previews in the message. Defaults to true.

post.summary: Send a media message (image, video, audio, document)
post.description:
Send a media message (image, video, audio, document) to a chat. The chatId format varies depending on the chat type:
- Individual chat: {phone_number}@c.us (e.g. 123456789@c.us)
- Group chat: {group_id}@g.us (e.g. 123456789-123456789@g.us)
- Channel/Newsletter: {channel_id}@newsletter (e.g. 123456789@newsletter)

Supported media types:
- Images: jpg, jpeg, png, gif
- Videos: mp4, 3gp, mov
- Audio: mp3, wav, ogg, m4a
- Documents: pdf, doc, docx, txt, xlsx, etc

requestBody.description: Media can be sent either via URL or Base64. For Base64 media, a filename is required.

mediaUrl.description: URL of the media file to send

mediaName.description: Optional filename for the media (required for Base64)

replyToMessageId.description: Optional message ID to reply to in format: <fromMe>_<chatId>_<messageHash>

post.summary: Mark chat messages as seen (blue ticks)
post.description: Mark all messages in a chat as seen (read). This will show blue ticks (double check marks) to the sender only if both parties have read receipts enabled in their WhatsApp privacy settings. If read receipts are disabled by either party, the messages will be marked as delivered (gray ticks) instead.

200.description: Successfully marked chat messages as seen

seenSend.description: Indicates if the seen status was successfully sent

post.description: Send a vCard to a contact or group.

requestBody.description: Request body containing the chat ID and vCard details.

waid.description: Optional. WhatsApp ID. Ensures the contact is properly displayed with an image and added to WhatsApp contacts.

internationalnumber.description: Optional. International phone number of the contact.

lastname.description: Optional. Last name of the contact.

firstname.description: Optional. First name of the contact.

displayname.description: Optional. Display name of the contact.

title.description: Optional. Title of the contact (e.g., Mr., Ms.).

secondname.description: Optional. Second name of the contact.

additionalname.description: Optional. Additional name of the contact.

email.description: Optional. Email address of the contact.

street.description: Optional. Street address of the contact.

zip.description: Optional. Zip code of the contact.

post.description: Send a location message to a contact or group chat. The location can include additional details like name, address and URL.

name.description: Optional. Name or title of the location

address.example: 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA
address.description: Optional. Full address of the location

url.description: Optional. URL associated with the location

address.example: 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA

post.description: Retrieves a list of all chats with their latest messages and metadata. Supports pagination.

offset.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

limit.description: The number of items to return

200.description: Returns a list of chats with their metadata and latest messages

post.description: Marks a specified chat conversation as unread. This is useful for flagging important conversations for later attention.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the WhatsApp instance

requestBody.description: Chat details required to mark as unread

post.description: Mute notifications for a specific chat either indefinitely or until a specified date

unmuteDate.description: Optional. ISO 8601 formatted date-time when the chat should be automatically unmuted. If not provided, chat will be muted indefinitely

chatMuted.description: Indicates if the chat was successfully muted

unmuteDate.description: When the chat will be automatically unmuted. Returns 'never' if muted indefinitely

post.description: Removes mute settings from a specified chat, allowing notifications to be received again.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the WhatsApp instance

requestBody.description: Request body containing the chat ID to unmute

chatUnmuted.description: Indicates if the chat was successfully unmuted

post.description: Pins a chat to the top of the chat list. The operation may fail if the maximum number of pinned chats (3) has been reached.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the WhatsApp instance

chatPinned.description: Indicates if the chat was successfully pinned

post.description: Removes a chat from pinned status. This endpoint allows you to unpin a previously pinned chat conversation.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the WhatsApp instance

requestBody.description: Request body containing the chat ID to unpin

chatUnpinned.description: Indicates if the chat was successfully unpinned

post.description: Retrieve messages from a specific chat with optional filtering and media inclusion

limit.description: Maximum number of messages to return

fromMe.description: Filter messages by sender (true = sent by me, false = received, null = both)

includeMedia.description: Include media content as base64 encoded strings. Warning: Can significantly increase response size

media.description: Base64 encoded media content if includeMedia=true

post.description: Retrieve a specific message using its unique identifier. Optionally includes the media content if requested.

includeMedia.description: When true, includes base64 encoded media content in the response

media.description: Base64 encoded media content if includeMedia=true

post.description: get a message info by id
delete a message by id

messageId.description: serialized messageId, fromMe_chatId_hash or for groups fromMe_groupId_messageHash_senderId

forEveryone.description: optional, delete message for all users or just for you, default: false

post.description: Search for messages across all chats or within a specific chat. Returns paginated results with message details.

query.description: Text to search for in messages

chatId.description: Optional chat ID to limit search scope

post.description: Retrieves a list of all contacts from the WhatsApp account, including saved contacts and WhatsApp users who have messaged you.

post.summary: Get WhatsApp chat ID from phone number
post.description: Converts a phone number into the proper WhatsApp chat ID format. This is especially useful for countries that don't follow the standard chat ID format (like Brazil, Mexico and Argentina). The endpoint ensures you get the correct chat ID for any phone number.

number.description: Phone number in international format without leading + or 00

post.description: Get the country code for a given phone number

number.description: Phone number to get country code for

post.description: Format a phone number into standardized format
Check if a given contactId is registered.
Creates and sends an interactive poll message to a specified chat. The poll can have between 2-12 options and optionally allow multiple selections.

caption.description: The poll question or caption text

options.description: Array of poll options. Must contain between 2 and 12 options.

multipleAnswers.description: When true, allows participants to select multiple options

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the message was sent

allowMultipleAnswers.description: Indicates if multiple options can be selected

post.description: Retrieves all available WhatsApp stories/status updates that are visible to the authenticated user. This includes both viewed and unviewed stories from contacts.

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp of when the story was posted

totalCount.description: Total number of stories from this contact

unreadCount.description: Number of unviewed stories from this contact

mediaKey.description: Encrypted media key for the story content

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp of the individual story

post.description: Retrieves the profile picture URL for a contact, chat, group, or newsletter. Access is subject to privacy settings. Use appropriate suffixes: @c.us for contacts/chats, @g.us for groups, @newsletter for newsletters.

profilePicUrl.description: URL of the profile picture. Returns null if no picture exists or access is restricted by privacy settings.

post.description: Retrieves detailed contact information for a specific WhatsApp contact using their ID. Returns contact details including name, number, business status, and various contact flags.

contactId.description: The WhatsApp ID of the contact in the format number@c.us

isBusiness.description: Whether the contact is a WhatsApp Business account

isEnterprise.description: Whether the contact is a WhatsApp Enterprise account

isMe.description: Whether this contact represents the current user

isUser.description: Whether this is a regular WhatsApp user

isGroup.description: Whether this is a group chat

isWAContact.description: Whether this contact has a WhatsApp account

isMyContact.description: Whether this contact is in the user's address book

isBlocked.description: Whether this contact is blocked by the user

post.description: Blocks a WhatsApp contact, preventing them from sending messages to the authenticated user. The contact will not be able to see the user's last seen, online status, or status updates.

contactId.description: The WhatsApp ID of the contact to block in the format number@c.us
The WhatsApp ID of the blocked contact

blocked.description: Indicates whether the contact was successfully blocked

post.description: Removes a contact from the blocked contacts list, allowing them to send messages and see your information again according to your privacy settings.

contactId.description: The WhatsApp ID of the contact to unblock in the format number@c.us
The WhatsApp ID of the unblocked contact

unblocked.description: Indicates whether the contact was successfully unblocked

post.description: Retrieves a list of all blocked contacts
Get list of groups that are in common between you and the specified contact

contactId.description: The WhatsApp ID of the contact

post.description: Retrieves the about/status info for a specific contact

contactId.description: The WhatsApp ID of the contact

about.example: Hey there! I am using WhatsApp
about.description: The contact's about/status info. Returns null if you don't have permission to view it

post.description: Get chat by ID
Delete chat by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Instance ID of the WhatsApp client

post.description: Creates a new WhatsApp group with specified name and participants

groupName.description: Name of the group to be created

groupParticipants.description: Array of WhatsApp contact IDs to add to the group

_serialized.description: Complete group ID in serialized format

missingParticipants.description: List of participants that could not be added to the group

post.description: Get group participants
Get group info
Get reactions for a specific message

messageId.description: The ID of the message to get reactions for

post.description: Add or remove a reaction emoji to/from a message

messageId.description: The ID of the message to react to

reaction.description: A single smiley emoji, or empty string to remove reaction

reacted.description: Whether a reaction was added (true) or removed (false)

reactedWith.description: The emoji that was used to react, or null if reaction was removed

messageId.description: The ID of the message that was reacted to

post.description: Update Group Information
Get mentions from a message

messageId.description: The ID of the message to get mentions from

post.description: Pin a message in a chat

messageId.description: The ID of the message to pin

duration.description: Optional duration in seconds for how long the message should stay pinned

post.description: Unpin a message in a chat
Star a message by its ID

messageId.description: ID of the message to star

post.description: Remove star from a message
Update Group Settings

messageAdminOnly.description: true: only admins can send messages, false: all users can send messages

post.description: Add a participant to a group
Remove a participant from a group
Promote a participant to admin
Demote a participant from admin to normal participant
Approve pending group membership requests
Deny pending group membership requests
Get pending group membership requests
Accept a WhatsApp group invite using an invite code
Get information about a group invite code

inviteCode.description: The group invite code to get information about

post.description: Create a channel
get your channels
get channel by id
subscribe to channel
unsubscribe from channel
Search for WhatsApp channels

searchText.description: Optional text to search for in channel names/descriptions

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

skipSubscribedNewsletters.description: Whether to skip already subscribed newsletters in results

post.description: archive chat
unarchive chat

200.description: return a list labels and their IDs

post.description: Get label by ID
Get chat labels by chat ID
Get chats by label ID
Logs out the client, closing the current session
Reboots your WhatsApp instance. This will close the current session and restart the client. The instance will need to be re-authenticated if it was previously logged in.
Sets the client's presence status to 'available'/'online'

available.description: Indicates if presence was set to available

post.description: Sets the WhatsApp status text for the connected account
Sets the display name for the WhatsApp account

displayName.description: The display name to set for the account

displayNameSet.description: Indicates if display name was set successfully

post.description: Request a WhatsApp pairing code for phone number registration. To prevent abuse and ensure system stability, pairing code requests are limited to 2 per minute. Multiple rapid requests may indicate automated abuse attempts to Whatsapp.

phoneNumber.description: Phone number in international format without symbols (e.g. 50664083362)

showNotification.description: Whether to show notification when pairing code is received

pairingCode.description: The pairing code for phone number registration

post.description: Sends typing state indicator to a chat

sendTyping.description: Indicates if typing state was sent successfully

post.description: Clears all messages from a specific chat

messagesCleared.description: Indicates if messages were cleared successfully

post.description: Synchronizes the chat history for a specific chat

historySynced.description: Indicates if chat history was synced successfully

post.description: Stops the typing indicator for a chat

sendStopTyping.description: Indicates if typing was stopped successfully

post.description: Sets the client's presence status to 'unavailable'/'offline'

available.description: Indicates if presence was set to available
